JNO. E. HAMILTON.
Attorney at Law, Examiner and Notary Public,
N. E. Corner 4th and Scott Streets. (up stairs)
Covington, Ky., Nov 13th 1860.

p.note: Collections made throughout the States of Kentucky Ohio Indiana and Missouri.
Clients informed of prospects of making claims by return Mail.

body.p:
Hon T. B Monroe
Secty of State
Dear Sir

Mr James J G. Craig of Cincinnati a lawyer desires the appointment of Commissioner for the state of Ohio. He is a Gentleman well worthy of the trust and will execute the duties in a manner highly satisfactory.
You will please have the appointment made out & sent him & also send bill of charges.
By an immediate attention to the above you will oblige &

yrs vry Truly
Jno E Hamilton.

P.S Although we met with an overwhelming defeat here we are determined to keep up the organization of the good democrats who voted for B & Lane. we have a meeting to night to determine upon our future course.

Ohio
Comr. of Deeds
Jas. G. Craig
Cincinnati
Com Issd Nov 14 1860
